text: فَفَهَّمۡنَٰهَا سُلَيۡمَٰنَۚ وَكُلًّا ءَاتَيۡنَا حُكۡمٗا وَعِلۡمٗاۚ وَسَخَّرۡنَا مَعَ دَاوُۥدَ ٱلۡجِبَالَ يُسَبِّحۡنَ وَٱلطَّيۡرَۚ وَكُنَّا فَٰعِلِينَ

translation.en: And We gave understanding of the case to Solomon, and to each [of them] We gave judgement and knowledge. And We subjected the mountains to exalt [Us], along with David and [also] the birds. And We were doing [that]
translation.id: Maka Kami memberikan pengertian kepada Sulaiman (tentang hukum yang lebih tepat);535) dan kepada masing-masing Kami berikan hikmah dan ilmu, dan Kami tundukkan gunung-gunung dan burung-burung, semua bertasbih bersama Dawud. Dan Kamilah yang melakukannya
